alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 02 at 2:15PM PDT until July 03 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Gusty north winds and very dry conditions Monday... Breezy and gusty north winds Monday through the Okanogan Valley and into the Waterville Plateau will result in elevated to critical fire weather conditions. Rapid spread of new fires is likely. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR OKANOGAN VALLEY AND WATERVILLE PLATEAU... The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM to 11 PM PDT Monday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area: Fire Weather Zone 703 Okanogan Valley (Zone 703) and Fire Weather Zone 706 Waterville Plateau (Zone 706). * Winds: North 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. Local gusts to 40 mph. * Relative Humidities: 10 to 20 percent. * Impacts: Rapid fire spread with any new fire starts.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
